title: Draft Genome Sequences from a Novel Clade of Bacillus cereusSensu Lato Strains, Isolated from the International Space Station

sections.abstract: The draft genome sequences of sixBacillusstrains, isolated from the International Space Station and belonging to theBacillus anthracis B. cereus B.thuringiensisgroup, are presented here. These strains were isolated from the Japanese Experiment Module (one strain), U.S. Harmony Node 2 (three strains), and Russian Segment Zvezda Module (two strains).
